name: semantic-bus
description: ETL style data middlware transformation embended in an ESB for all kind of data

scripts.mongoRun: sudo docker run -d -v data:/data/db -p 27017:27017 --name mongo mongo:3.6
scripts.mongoStop: sudo docker stop mongo && sudo docker rm mongo
scripts.amqpStop: sudo docker stop rabbitmq && sudo docker rm rabbitmq
scripts.dockerPush: sudo docker tag semanticbus-app semanticbus/semanticbus && sudo docker push semanticbus/semanticbus
scripts.dockerStop: sudo docker stop semanticbus-app && sudo docker rm semanticbus-app
scripts.dockerRun: sudo docker run -i -P -p 8080:80 --link rabbitmq --name semanticbus-app semanticbus-app
scripts.dockerRun2: sudo docker run -i -P -p 8080:80 --link rabbitmq --name semanticbus-app -e CONFIG_URL='http://data-players.com/config/devButProd.json' semanticbus-app
scripts.dockerRunProd: sudo docker run -i -P -p 8080:80 --link rabbitmq --name semanticbus-app -e CONFIG_URL='http://data-players.com/config/prod.json' semanticbus-app

author: Simon Louvet <simon.louvet.zen@gmail.com> && Boceno Alexandre <bocenoalex@gmail.com>
